CustomerInstruction: The main page will give you details on existing entries of customers. If you want to add a new customer, click the + icon in the top right and fill in the details. All customer information will be saved, you don't need to worry about potential data loss.

instructions_content: The main page will give you details on existing entries of flights. If you want to add a new flight, click the + icon in the top right and fill in the details. All flight information will be saved, you don't need to worry about potential data loss.
no_flights: There are no flights at this time.
instructionContent: Manage your reservations by adding, viewing, and deleting.
instructionDetails:
Manage your reservations by:

1. Adding new reservations using the text fields and Add Reservation button.
2. Viewing details of a reservation by tapping on it in the list.
3. Deleting a reservation by either long-pressing on it or using the delete button in the details page.

Long press on a reservation for quick actions like view details and delete.
deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this reservation?
Submit_Question_key: Would you like to submit these?
All_fields_must_be_entered_!: All fields must be filled in!
1.Fill_in_the_fields_with_airplane_detai: 1. Fill the fields with the airplane details.
2.Tap_the_'Submit'_button_to_save_the_in: Press the 'Submit' button to save the information
